welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Simpsonville, the charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Donaldson Center Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Downtown Airport serves commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse at Greenville Spartanburg International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Spartanburg Downtown Memorial Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pickens Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anderson Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anderson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
